delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete all your data? This action is irreversible.
credits_beta_text: Special thanks to our beta testers, whose feedback was invaluable in shaping this game. Their contributions have been greatly appreciated:
credits_affiliation_text: Pokegg and all elements of this website are not affiliated with The Pokémon Company International. Pokémon is a registered trademark of The Pokémon Company International. All references to Pokémon in this project are made for educational and recreational purposes only.
changelog_v0500_1_desc: Choose which sprite to display for Pokémon throughout the entire application.
changelog_v0500_1b: 5G Static: Pokémon Black & White sprites. Pixelated like on DS.
changelog_v0500_1c: 5G Anim: ANIMATED sprites like on Pokémon Black & White 2.
changelog_v0404_1a: Options page translations now load correctly on page load
changelog_v0404_1b: Idle mode no longer allows multiple eggs to hatch simultaneously
changelog_v0403_1_desc: For your little eyes. Activable in options.
changelog_v0403_2_desc: A mode allowing you to chain eggs automatically with the incubator autoclicker. Activable in options.
changelog_v0403_3a: A click outside a popup closes it.
changelog_v0403_3b: Purchases and item usage in inventory greatly streamlined
idle_description: Automatically hatch the next egg after 1 second if no new Pokémon popup appears
changelog_v0600_1_desc: Redeem promotional codes to unlock rewards. Cheat codes and promotional distributions.
changelog_v0600_2_desc: Fixed sprites for Nidoran family, Mime Jr., and Skarmory families.
guide_objective_desc: The goal of Pokegg is to complete your Pokédex by hatching eggs and collecting all Pokémon. Each click generates Pokédollars that you can use to purchase incubators and multipliers in the shop.
guide_rarities_desc: Pokémon are distributed across 5 rarity levels: Common (easier to find), Uncommon, Rare, Epic, and Legendary (rarest). The rarity of an egg affects the base number of clicks needed to hatch it.
guide_evolution_desc: Evolved Pokémon forms (like Charmeleon or Charizard) only appear in the egg pool after you've caught their previous evolutionary forms (Charmander in this example). This encourages you to complete the full evolutionary lines.
guide_inventory_desc: Use the Inventory to manage and activate your purchased items. The Shop allows you to buy Incubators (for auto-clicking) and Click Multipliers (to boost your earning per click) using Pokédollars.
guide_incubator_desc: Incubators automatically generate clicks at a set rate per second. You can stack multiple incubators to increase your auto-click speed. Incubators combine with your Click Power multiplier to maximize earnings.
guide_redeem_desc: Use the Redeem Code page to enter promotional codes and unlock special rewards. Example: Use code STR4T to get Epic eggs and 150 Pokédollars!
guide_keyboard_desc: On PC, use these shortcuts: Press Space or click the egg to hatch it. Press I to open Inventory. Press S or B to open Shop.
guide_mobile_desc: On mobile, click the egg to hatch it. Swipe your hatched Pokémon to the right to trigger the next egg hatching (same as clicking Open another egg).
guide_idle_desc: Idle Mode automatically progresses to the next egg after 1 second if no new Pokémon popup appears. This is useful for hands-off gameplay. Activable in Options.
guide_sprites_desc: Change your preferred sprite style in Options. Choose between Classic (default 3D models), 5G Static (Black & White pixel art), or 5G Animated (animated Black & White 2 sprites).
guide_about_content: Pokegg is an incremental clicker game where you hatch Pokémon eggs to collect and complete your Pokédex. Each click earns you Pokédollars, which you can invest in purchasing incubators and click multipliers to accelerate your progress.
guide_incubators_desc: Generate automatic clicks. Stack multiple for faster progress.
guide_multipliers_desc: Increase your earning per click (example: 2x = double earnings).
guide_incubator_example: Example: If you have 3 clicks/sec from incubators and 2x Click Power, you get 6 clicks/sec.
guide_mobile_swipe_desc: Open the next egg (requires 50+ pixels movement)
guide_sprites_5g_static_desc: Black & White pixel art sprites (like DS era)
changelog_v0610_1_desc: Click the egg or press Space to hatch it. Swipe hatched Pokémon right on mobile to open the next egg.
changelog_v0610_2_desc: Press I for Inventory, S or B for Shop.
changelog_v0610_3_desc: New comprehensive guide explaining game mechanics, rarities, shop, incubator, redeem codes, and more.
changelog_v0620_1_desc: Fixed exploit where holding down Space key would spam clicks. Now one press = one click, regardless of how long the key is held down.
changelog_v0630_1_desc: Prices adjusted (increase price of incubators, decrease price of flame click. +1 max flame click).
